newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada Tungsten holders okay Aur merger.
newsitem.headline: Canada Tungsten holders okay Aur merger.

text.p: Canada Tungsten Inc shareholders have approved a merger with Aur Resources Inc, the two companies said on Monday.
The shareholders voted on the merger proposal at a special meeting today. The merger is expected to become effective January 1, 1997.
Canada Tungsten shareholders will receive one common share and one common share purchase warrant of Aur for each 4.5 common shares of Canada Tungsten.

Aur will issue about 5,651,000 common shares and 5,651,000 common share purchase warrants to Canada Tungsten shareholders when the merger is complete, bringing its total shares outstanding to 76.6 million.
